response: "{ \"title\": \"Maximum Non-Adjacent Sum\", \"description\": \"You are given a sequence of integers. Write a function that calculates the maximum sum of non-adjacent elements in this sequence.\\n\\n#### Function Signature\\n```python\\ndef max_non_adjacent_sum(nums: list[int)) -> int:\\n```\\n\\n#### Input\\n- `nums` (list[int]): A list of integers.\\n\\n#### Output\\n- Returns the maximum sum of non-adjacent elements in the input sequence.\\n\", \"code\": \"def max_non_adjacent_sum(nums: list[int]) -> int:\\n    if len(nums) <= 2:\\n        return max(0, max(nums))\\n    incl = nums[0]\\n    excl = 0\\n    for i in range(1, len(nums)):\\n        new_excl = max(incl, excl)\\n        incl = nums[i] + excl\\n        excl = new_excl\\n    return max(incl, excl)\\n\", \"tests\": [\"assert max_non_adjacent_sum([2, 7, 9, 3, 1]) == 12\", \"assert max_non_adjacent_sum([-5, -3, 0, 9, -2]) == 10\", \"assert max_non_adjacent_sum([1, 4, 10, 3, 7, 16]) == 17\"] }"
